title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. Simple yet delicious.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Fry the guanciale in a pan until crisp.
Whisk eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Toss hot pasta with the egg mixture and guanciale (off the heat to avoid scrambling).
Serve immediately with extra pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked.
Prepare the tomato gravy with onions, ginger, and garlic.
Add the chicken to the gravy and simmer.
Stir in cream and serve with naan or rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy mix of fresh vegetables tossed in a savory soy and ginger sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Stir fry garlic and ginger until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes (keep them crunchy).
Pour in soy sauce, toss well, and serve over steamed rice.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich, fudgy chocolate brownies with a crackly top and gooey center. Perfect for dessert.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Melt butter and mix with sugar until smooth.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Fold in cocoa powder, flour, and chocolate chips.
Pour batter into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until set.
